name: Co Do Grosza
overview: Co do grosza is an enhanced classic board monopoly game for up to five players. The main rules remain unchanged. Each round begins with rolling the dice. The players move around the board, buy, sell and pledge of real estate or invest in infrastructure. The game introduced all the classic fields, such as prison or train stations and a lot of new ones, such as random encounter or lotto lottery, as well as some new features, such as property stock exchange or bank loan. Full board encirclement ends up with Year summary - including a fee, taxes, expenses, account interest rates or repayment of loans.
